column1: Incase anyone has the Coronavirus and they heard that elderberries are helpful PLEASE DONT TAKE ANY FORM OF THEM, we have a friend who has a PHD and they said there have been studies that show it makes the virus WORSE!!! Please stay safe

Incase anyone has the Coronavirus and they heard that elderberries are helpful PLEASE DONT TAKE ANY FORM OF THEM, we have a friend who has a PHD and they said there have been studies that show it makes the virus WORSE!!! Please stay safe
